stripped_text: Install Trypano only on a piece of ice. When Trypano has 5 or more virus counters on it, trash host ice. When your turn begins, you may place 1 virus counter on Trypano.
text:
Install Trypano only on a piece of ice.
When Trypano has 5 or more virus counters on it, trash host ice.
When your turn begins, you may place 1 virus counter on Trypano.
title: Trypano
